column2: UPDATE 2-Greenberg's Starr leads $4.4 bln MultiPlan acquisition Feb 17 Former AIG boss Maurice "Hank" Greenberg's Starr Investment Holdings LLC said on Monday it had agreed to take over health insurance claims processor MultiPlan Inc in what is by far its biggest private equity investment to date. ~Group led by Greenberg's Starr to buy MultiPlan for $4.4 bln - WSJ Feb 17 A group led by former AIG boss Maurice "Hank" Greenberg's Starr Investment Holdings is close to buying health insurance claims processor MultiPlan Inc for about $4.4 billion

column2: UPDATE 1-Duke Energy to sell U.S. Midwest commercial generation business Feb 17 U.S. electric power company Duke Energy Corp said on Monday that it was looking to sell off its Midwest commercial generation business
column4: saying they offered "volatile returns" in a competitive market. ~CORRECTED-Duke Energy to exit Midwest commercial generation business Feb 17 U.S. power company Duke Energy  said it was looking to sell its Midwest commercial generation business including 13 power plants. ~
